hero.intro: Software Engineer with over ten years of experience, focused on code quality and performance optimization, particularly through web application refactoring. Skilled in Scrum framework, I have also led retrospectives to enhance team processes. Team cohesion is crucial to me, and I foster a collaborative environment. I particularly value pair programming and Test-Driven Development (TDD) for their effectiveness in skill development and continuous code improvement. I'm also enthusiastic about contributing to innovative projects and exploring new technologies.

chanel.details: CHANEL - Full time Contract - Remote - Jul 2022 to Apr 2024
chanel.description: I contributed to the ongoing refactoring of a web application for the internal point of sale reference system, with the goal of reducing technical debt while adding new features. Emphasis was placed on quality and performance, particularly in database design (SQL Server), involving extensive unit and integration testing, Test-Driven Development (TDD), and rigorous code reviews.

kayentis.details: Kayentis - Full time Position - Grenoble, France - Mar 2018 to Mar 2022
kayentis.description: I sarted as a back-end developer on Clin'Form 3, a multi-platform eCOA solution for clinical trials, I progressively broadened my scope across tools and technologies. I added features to the REST API, maintained internal data loaders (Python), and co-designed production-ready PoCs like an API request interceptor. I introduced property-based testing (junit-quickcheck) to improve Groovy scripts validation, designed mobile test automation prototypes, and supported CI (Jenkins) and front-end dev (Angular, Android). Strong focus on quality via TDD, code reviews, pair/mob programming, and active involvement in functional discussions with the PO and dev team.

open.details: Open - Full time Position - Grenoble, France - Fev 2017 to Mar 2018
open.description:
**Android developer**:
First project Team: 2 Android developers, 1 back-end developer.
We developed and released a secure browser for android focused on user privacy.

Second project Team: 1 Android developer, 1 iOS developer, 1 Back-end developer.
I developed the main frame and architecture of the coaching feature of an existing android app. This app connects via bluetooth to a 'Smart pillow'.

**Full stack developer**
I Developed from scratch front (Hybrid application using Kony framework) and back-end (hosted in IBM bluemix) using Spring Boot framework.
The app is mainly used as a support utility. It allows the back-end to forward a dynamic e-mail to a decicated IT support team.

wifitoggler.description: I designed and released an open-source Android application for automatic Wi-Fi management. [Wi-Fi-Toggler - GitHub](https://github.com/chris-carneiro/Wi-Fi-Toggler)

laroueverte.details: LaRoueVerte.com - Contract - Grenoble, France - Mar 2015 to Mar 2015
laroueverte.description:
First Client: LaRoueVerte.com
Feasability study and prototyping of a carpooling Android application. (The content is under NDA)

astek.details: SFR (via Astek) - Full time position - Grenoble, France - Jun 2013 - Nov 2014
astek.description:
- Developed a network diagnostic app (GIS mapping, speed tests, incident reporting).
- Migrated SOAP to REST (JSON) for a visual voicemail app (1M+ downloads), with UI integration.
- Added features to a mobile security app (100K+ downloads): remote lockdown, geolocation, and backup.

inilead.details: Inilead - Full time position - San Francisco - New York City, USA - Sep 2012 - Dec 2012
inilead.description: Inilead provides consultants to start-ups that need support on their projects. I first started in San Francisco, where I registered a new consulting branch and found a workplace. At the same time, I looked for a C2C contract as a Junior Java Developer. As time passed quickly, I decided to try my luck in New York where a branch was already in place. Unfortunately, finding a C2C contract proved itself to be complicated since most of the companies that I contacted were instead looking for either a contractor or a full-time engineer eligible to work (I had an E-2 visa).

comarch.details: Comarch - Full time position - Grenoble, France - Oct 2011 to Jul 2012
comarch.description: I contributed to the integration of an M2M platform into a CRM portal (Java, PL/SQL, Groovy, Liferay) for Deutsche Telekom.

capgemini.details: Capgemini Télécom Média Défense - Apprenticeship/Full time - Grenoble, France - Jul 2010 à Oct 2011
capgemini.description: I drastically optimized a data processing tool written in PL/SQL for Orange (95% reduction in execution time). I also contributed to the implementation of a service for detecting available IP address ranges for France Telecom (Java, WebLogic, XML).
